title: dkbit98
author: dkbit98
content: Let's celebrate 14th year anniversary of Bitcointalk forum with SATOCHIP Special Edition Bitcointalk Card!This is unique limited edition hardware wallet in card format, with design inspired by Satoshi and Bitcointalk forum.Satochip will release this limited series for 14th years anniversary only, and you won't be able to purchase them ever again.This card can be used as regular Open Source hardware wallet, and as valuable collectibles item.Easy Rules:- Post your Username.- Post your feedback about Satochip Special Edition Card Design.- Only active members are accepted starting from Full Member rank.- Multiple accounts are not allowed, and I reserve the right to exclude some participants for any reason.- Shipping is done directly by Satochip officials.- Exact draw date will be announced later.Winner will be selected with Bitmover's giveaway manager: https://bitcoindata.science/giveaway-manager/SATOCHIP Exclusive 14th Years Bitcointalk Special Edition 1:QuoteIf you don't believe me or don't get it, I don't have time to try to convince you, sorry.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=532.msg6269#msg6269Find out more about Satochip products on their official website, and use 20% discount with FREE Keychain deal using code BF-20:https://satochip.io/

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: user: cygani own a few SatoChip cards myself and am very impressed by the quality as well as the alleged (i haven't tested it because i use it as a collector's item) functionality that it offersand as far as the design is concerned, i can only say that you have succeeded once again. considering the anniversary, all the important points are visible on the cardthe forum itself, the Bitcoin founder satoshi and of course SatoChip

comments.author: Remsjack
comments.body: This is a wonderful idea! The Satochip Special Edition Cards look really great and it is awesome to think that Satoshi's virtual bitcointalk profile will be on a physical object. I don't understand why it wasn't done before  well done!My username is Remsjack and I am keeping my fingers crossed

comments.author: BABY SHOES
comments.body: I'm sorry the shipping cost wasn't mentioned before, does that mean it's on the winner?

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: user: examplensNice project and a good idea! I can only sound like a bot until I hold one SatoChip card in my hands. But I like the way it looks. btw. Will it be possible to make a custom card or is only satoshi's account available? (I don't mean only this raffle)

comments.author: Buchi-88
comments.body: user: Buchi-88The card looks simple on one side, but everything is very organised and clear. Unfortunately, you can't see the second side, as the Bitcoin logo could perhaps be a little stronger.Otherwise I really like the design and of course it's a rare collector's item.Thank you for the chance to win this card.

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Username : hopenotlateBeing a proud member of this forum since almost ten years and I being bitcointalk the main source of my crypto knowledge I find that design beautiful to say the least!It reminds me of the beginnings of my cryptojourney and in particular that Satoshi's quote is what embodies that period most: nowadays everyone knows what bitcoin and blockchain technology are (even if someone, clearly in bad faith, insists on saying that whether it's a ponzi and/or he compares it to tulips) but in the first years there were many more skeptics.Owning that card would make me feel part of the lucky elite that I consider the bitcoin community to be.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Feedback for cards means that you can post whatever you like or don't like with current design and propose potential improvements.Shipping for all Satochip products should be free worldwide (EU, USA, Canada, etc) without tracking, but you can choose to pay additional fee for tracking if you want.Quote from: examplens on November 21, 2023, 02:59:54 PMWill it be possible to make a custom card or is only satoshi's account available? (I don't mean only this raffle)We can arrange to create similar Satochip designs for cards featuring different forum accounts and different quotes.Anyone interested to order something like that can send me PM with instructions, and I will talk with designers and Satochip team.You will get exact price offer after that, and you are guaranteed to have unique product that is never going to be released for regular sale.Quote from: Buchi-88 on November 21, 2023, 03:04:36 PMThe card looks simple on one side, but everything is very organised and clear. Unfortunately, you can't see the second side, as the Bitcoin logo could perhaps be a little stronger.I think the other side of card will have Satochip logo with the same bitcointalk forum design and serie number.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Username: iwantmyhomepaidwithbtc2Thank you for organizing such a raffle! It's nice to have something to mark the forum's anniversary. I love the card design! I find very interesting the choice you took to show satoshi's account with the dates that correspond to the anniversary, well done!

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Username: bitmover Review:Beautiful hardware wallet. Looks just like the forum.Just in time. I am looking for a new hardware wallet , as the old one that I use just lost a lot of credibility. I would just use a different quote, as this is one is somehow agreesive. Anyway  beautiful product and Good work satochip

comments.author: Porfavor-JAY
comments.body: Username: Porfavor-JAYCreated my account to join this awesome raffle. Always been a lurker on the forum  I love the design of these limited edition satochip cards. A great way to celebrate this 14th birthday. I would love to have such a limited edition card in my collection. Nothing beats one of a kind goodies like these satochip cards! Very thankful to the satochip team to host a giveaway like this.Good luck everyone!

comments.author: NeilLostBitCoin
comments.body: Username- NeilLostBitcoinReview- The cards have a forum-like design and feature Satoshi's famous quotes, making them unique. I would like to have one of these cards in the future. It would be great if we could customize the cards by adding our usernames, making them even more unique and personalized.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Username: ajiz138This edition card is very unique as it is the only one custom-made by SATOCHIP, as well as with a very nice design (satoshi account view) and of course it will be very rare, so collaboration with SATOCHIP is a great thing.I want to have a rare card as a collection and this will be a precious memory of my time on the forum especially with the 14th anniversary.How about the back view, is it exactly the same as the front?

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Username: cafterThis cards gives feeling of bitcointalk forum exactly same design and look. Thank you for organizing this nice raffle.

comments.author: YodasRedRocket
comments.body: Username: YodasRedRocketFeedback: Cool Design.  I'm a Satochip fan... have a few in the collection.Thanks for the raffle!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Username: MoparMiningLLCI have always liked the Satochip designs and have at least a dozen or so designs from them. Have met a few of the guys from Satochip at the various conferences and they are always friendly and helpful. Keep up the good work guys!now for feedback on this current design. I like that it provides connection to the forum. I like how the stats are displayed but I have a question - does it have Satoshi's information or will you customize the cards to match the forum member buying them? That would be cool but I imagine an expensive and time consuming venture.

comments.author: JanEmil
comments.body: Username: JanEmilFun idea and a very limited card to show off in the collectible space.

comments.author: willi9974
comments.body: User: willi9974Absolutely cool idea and would love to have a card. A must have for bitcoin collectors. This is a great tribute to the forum that the creator of bitcoin was active here.Very cool design in forum context.I love it.Best regards,Willi

comments.author: bitcoiner24h
comments.body: user: bitcoiner24hThis card is a really good idea that brings us a bit closer to Satoshi. Actually having this card in my collection would be my favorite

comments.author: SirJohnVonSlotty
comments.body: Username: SirJohnVonSlottyFeedback: The card is a good reminder on how old the forum looks and that it's in a dire need of a redesign and new features
